name: Super Jump
description:
Jump, jump and collect all stars!

Fun one-level game developed in only three weeks during New York Film Academy's first VR Game design program. This game was created  by developer Pilar Aranda. Super Jump Robo Star is a Lighthearted game specially designed to help children and adults stay physically active by getting points while collecting stars and coins in space.

Pilar Aranda http://PilarAB.com

Available for HTC Vive.

Robots, Ghosts, and Collectables are Pilar Aranda's designs.

Keyboard: NormalVR CC Attribution.

Music: Ben Drakw, Dzynek CC Attribution.
Platform: Red Panda CC Attribution.
Skybox: LemonSpawn CC Attribution.
